---
title: "brand.yml Python Package"
subtitle: "Unified Branding for Humans"

format: gfm
---

```{python}
from brand_yml import Brand

brand = Brand(
    meta = {"name": "Posit PBC", "link": "https://posit.co"}
)

brand.meta
```

## Installation

### From PyPI

```bash
uv pip install brand_yml
```

### From GitHub

```bash
uv pip install "git+https://github.com/posit-dev/brand-yml#subdirectory=pkg-py"
```
